name: business-doc-processor
description: Enterprise Document Processing Application - Microservices with React/Node.js/TypeScript

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../document-service && npm install && cd ../processing-service && npm install && cd ../reporting-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.test:services: cd services/auth-service && npm test && cd ../document-service && npm test && cd ../processing-service && npm test && cd ../reporting-service && npm test && cd ../api-gateway && npm test
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/auth-service && npm run build && cd ../document-service && npm run build && cd ../processing-service && npm run build && cd ../reporting-service && npm run build && cd ../api-gateway && npm run build
